want to find patterns in your data that no one knows about yet
like sure you can identify cats and dogs but what are the features that you may never have thought of that you might

letters in the bottom data mining data mining is kind of an old-fashioned thing at this point but it has never gone away
it's not the buzzword anymore but data mining is this idea of getting insights

a doughnut are the same to a topologist because you can transform one from from
one to the other without ripping anything you're not tearing any holes you're just stretching there's no gluing
there's no ripping you're not changing some important features of the data that
